title: Help :l
body: wat i tried everything my internet was great, i did the firewall shet now wth should i do?

replies.body: The issue here may not necessarily be with the installation itself, but actually with security settings that's preventing the game from launching.  While reinstalling could possibly scrub some settings, I suggest using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a more permanent fix.  Otherwise, it's possible that the issue may return!
It happens to me too. If you get help and make a way so you enter the game succesfully please tell me too!

>
> It happens to me too. If you get help and make a way so you enter the game succesfully please tell me too!

lol it fixed all what i did is uninstall and re install
Hi! I Downloaded the game after i uninstalled it and i got it to work! Hope this works for you! (I'm Just A Player).
